docs.snippet: In a story Feb. 2 about Amazon's earnings, The Associated Press reported erroneously the name of the CEO of Convey, a company specializing in improving retailer shipment delivery. His name is Rob Taylor, not Rob Convey....

docs.snippet: Amgen Inc on Thursday posted a higher-than-expected fourth-quarter profit, helped by a jump in sales of its Enbrel rheumatoid arthritis drug, but it issued a 2017 sales and earnings forecast range below current Wall Street estimates....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amgen Inc on Thursday posted a higher-than-expected fourth-quarter profit, helped by a jump in sales of its Enbrel rheumatoid arthritis drug, but it issued a 2017 sales and earnings forecast range below current Wall Street estimates.
